name: Black Ice Cream Quiz | Word Play | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Caesar.

	Hail, Caesar! A Caesar salad contains romaine lettuce, garlic croutons, parmesan cheese, and anchovies. The dressing contains oil, vinegar, egg, garlic, and anchovy paste.

lightning.

	Something that is as fast as greased lightning is VERY fast! Game shows sometimes have lightning rounds in which contestants try to answer questions very quickly.

cloud.

	Rain cloud, Cloud Nine. When you're on Cloud Nine, you're ecstatically happy.

bank.

	San Francisco is famous for its fog banks. You've probably seen photos of them.

plow & plough.

	Snowplow, plowshares. Plowshares are the parts of plows that actually cut furrows in the soil. After a war, the old saying goes, you're supposed to recycle swords to make these.

earth.

	Scorched earth, earth mother. In a "scorched earth" military strategy, the military destroys everything in its path. In the 1960s and 70s, an "earth mother" was a motherly hippie chick who believed in New Age philosophies and did lots of cooking, gardening, and sewing.

cock.

	A weathercock is a weather vane shaped like a rooster. A cock robin is a male robin, as in the song "Who Killed Cock Robin?"

sky.

	"Sky King" was a 1950s TV show in which the hero was a rancher/pilot who flew a small plane. Its intro went: "Out of the blue of the Western sky comes SKY KING!" Sky King had a niece named Penny and a nephew named Clipper.

white.

	A bobwhite is a bird, a kind of quail. "Cleans like a white tornado!" was an advertising slogan for Ajax cleanser.
